H0.text: A frugivore feeds on what. Nuts

H1.text: A frugivore feeds on what. Seeds

H2.text: A frugivore feeds on what. Pollen

H3.text: A frugivore feeds on what. Friut

A4.text: A frugivore is an animal that thrives mostly on fruits.

A5.text: Frugivores can benefit or hinder fruit-producing plants by either dispersing or destroying their seeds through digestion.

A6.text: Approximately 20% of mammalian herbivores eat fruit.

A7.text: Orangutans discard the skin, eat the flesh, and spit out the seeds.
